location.description: The inferred location query, or null if no location query can be inferred

airports.description: The airport or ordered list of airports highly relevant to the location query, ordered from most to least relevant, or null if no location is inferred or if there are no airport results

iata_code.description: The three-letter IATA airport code for the airport

name.description: The airport's full, official name in English

is_international.description: True if the airport is located in a country other than the United States, otherwise false
